caption.title: Agreement of best model subsets built with best-ranked suite of environmental variables for larval Aedes aegypti presence in Ecuador under current climate conditions.
caption.p: Models had high levels of agreement in the western coastal lowlands, and lower levels of agreement in the eastern Amazon basin. This figure was produced in ArcMap 10.4 (ESRI, Redlands, CA) using rasters of model output produced with DesktopGARP (ver. 1.1.3), and elevation data freely available from NASAâ€™s Shuttle Radar Topography Mission ( jpl.nasa.gov/srtm).
